name: Alps
brief:
Core definitions for ALPS parallel tree search framework

Central header defining enumerations, constants, and types for the
Abstract Library for Parallel Search (ALPS).

**Core enumerations:**
- AlpsNodeStatus: Node states (Candidate, Evaluated, Pregnant, Branched, Fathomed)
- AlpsSearchType: Search strategies (BestFirst, BreadthFirst, DepthFirst, Hybrid)
- AlpsKnowledgeType: Knowledge categories (Model, Node, Solution, SubTree)
- AlpsExitStatus: Termination status (Optimal, TimeLimit, NodeLimit, etc.)
- AlpsPhase: Execution phase (Rampup, Search, Rampdown)

**Key constants:**
- ALPS_OBJ_MAX, ALPS_BND_MAX: Numerical bounds
- ALPS_ZERO, ALPS_GEN_TOL: Numerical tolerances

**Design philosophy:**
- Subtree is the basic unit of work in parallel execution
- Workers process subtrees autonomously
- Hub brokers coordinate work distribution
